events.message: I recently purchased a jacket, but it doesn't fit and I would like to request a refund for the item.
The issue has been identified as a refund request related to an ill-fitting product.
A customer service representative has been assigned to handle the refund case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the condition of the jacket so we can proceed with the refund?
The order number is #123456789 and the jacket is unused with all tags still attached, I'd like to return it as soon as possible.
Thank you for the details. We will send you a prepaid return shipping label. Once we receive the jacket in good condition, we will process your refund promptly.

We have received your returned jacket and successfully processed your refund. You should see the amount back on your payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your case.
Yes, I received the refund yesterday. Thanks for your help and smooth service!
We are glad your issue was resolved. Your case has now been closed. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a survey invitation via email to gather your feedback on our service.
